title: Pfizer, BioNTech Ask FDA to Expand Covid-19 Booster Use to All Adults
sub_head: If the FDA grants the request, the companiesâ€™ booster shot would be cleared for people 18 years and older, in addition to certain high-risk adults already eligible
body:
Pfizer Inc. and partner BioNTech SE asked U.S. health regulators to expand the authorization of their Covid-19 booster to people as young as 18 years old, as the government explores expanding access to extra doses.
The application opens the door for authorization of the extra dose potentially before the end of the year, which could provide millions of people with another layer of security as winter drives many indoors where the risk of transmission is higher.
